mapper.select: select r.recipeName, m.menuName, m.imgurl, r.`view` from recipe r join menu m on r.mcode = m.mcode order by view desc limit 5

SELECT r.rcode, r.recipeName, m.menuName, m.imgurl, COUNT(rr.rcode) recommendCnt FROM recipe r JOIN recipe_recommend rr ON r.rcode = rr.rcode JOIN menu m ON m.mcode = r.mcode GROUP BY r.rcode, r.recipeName, m.menuName ORDER BY recommendCnt desc limit 5
